channel.title: Awaken Your Jewish Identity: Classic Sinai Podcast
channel.itunes:description: Jewish audio mp3s for the curious mind.
channel.itunes:author: Rabbi Avi Geller

item.title: Awaken Your Jewish Identity
item.description: The latest society craze is to escape the melting pot and embrace your cultural heritage - so stop opting out and discover how Jewish roots can help you build a whole new fashionable personality.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Avi Geller
